channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3663] New payment method for ITA
item.description:
INPUT:

1. B2B customer has 3 payment methods. (Rimessa diretta, Credit cards, Ricevuta Bancaria)
2. When they choose Ricevuta Bancaria, there will be a page that will contain the following information:

  • a. Billing Address (Information is already filled in from previous steps)
  • b. Shipping Address (Information is already filled in from previous steps)
  • c. Shipping method (Information is already filled in from previous steps)
  • d. Payment method (Ricevuta Bancaria)
    i. Bank Name – mandatory text field
    ii. ABI – Mandatory text field (ABI is always a 5 digit number)
    iii. Cab – Mandatory text field (CAB is always a 5 digit number)

OUTPUT:
The information should be written in the HMC Movex Order as
For example:
attribute BankCollectionCAB: 36670
attribute BankCollectionInstitute: Credito Emiliano
attribute BankCollectionABI: 03032

INFO:
We should also define the payment methode for Movex.

comments.comment: Is this offered by DeuCS?
No

Code = 004
ERP Code = 004

Please approve "Code" with Raphael Husi.
ready for testing

Could you please add the current fix version.
Please set finished tickets on status "testing" and assigned it to me.
thx.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3546] Language specific URL fields in all CMS components
item.description:
The CMS is lacking an important functionality concerning the URL field.

Currently it’s not possible to add an URL for every single language the shop is available in.

We require the “globe”-function in the screenshot below next to the URL field in all CMS components containing this URL field so we can add a specific URL for every language.
item.summary: Language specific URL fields in all CMS components

comments.comment:
Hi Raphael

I don't have lot of experience with the CMS,
maybe you can have a look into this one.

Thanks René

Process:

  • Export all components with its PK and url attribute
  • Change the attribute via system update from string to localized string
  • Import the exported urls for language de

Hallo Adi

Gemäss Planung kümmerst du dich jetzt ja um die v1.1 Tickets.

Gruss René

Get all links in the system from the CH staged catalog version:

SELECT ';'||{comp.PK}||';'||{comp.url}||';'||{c.id}||':'||{cv.version} as link 
FROM {CMSLinkComponent AS comp JOIN CatalogVersion AS cv ON {comp.catalogVersion}={cv.PK} JOIN Catalog AS c ON {cv.catalog}={c.PK}} 
WHERE {c.id}='distrelec_CHContentCatalog' AND {cv.version}='Staged' AND {comp.url} IS NOT NULL

Take this list and reimport it with the following ImpEx:

UPDATE CMSLinkComponent;pk[unique=true];localizedUrl[lang=de];catalogVersion(catalog(id),version)[unique=true]

UPDATE CMSLinkComponent;pk[unique=true];localizedUrl[lang=en];catalogVersion(catalog(id),version)[unique=true]

UPDATE CMSLinkComponent;pk[unique=true];localizedUrl[lang=fr];catalogVersion(catalog(id),version)[unique=true]

Get all banners in the system from the staged catalog versions:

SELECT {ct.code}||';'||{comp.PK}||';'||{comp.urlLink}||';'||{c.id}||':'||{cv.version} as link 
FROM {AbstractBannerComponent AS comp JOIN CatalogVersion AS cv ON {comp.catalogVersion}={cv.PK} JOIN Catalog AS c ON {cv.catalog}={c.PK} JOIN ComposedType AS ct ON {comp.itemtype}={ct.PK}} 
WHERE {c.id}='distrelec_CHContentCatalog' AND {cv.version}='Staged' AND {comp.urlLink} IS NOT NULL

Take this list and reimport it with the following ImpEx:

UPDATE AbstractBannerComponent;pk[unique=true];localizedUrlLink[lang=de];catalogVersion(catalog(id),version)[unique=true]

UPDATE AbstractBannerComponent;pk[unique=true];localizedUrlLink[lang=en];catalogVersion(catalog(id),version)[unique=true]

UPDATE AbstractBannerComponent;pk[unique=true];localizedUrlLink[lang=fr];catalogVersion(catalog(id),version)[unique=true]

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3780] SEO modififcation: rel="canonical"
item.description:
Google should index only SEO opimized URLs from our web shop.
For example: http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Leuchtdrucktaster%2C-komplett-EAO-44-747-24-010/p/13511868

At the momentan Google is indexing a lot of more URLs like:
http://www.distrelec.ch/de/Leuchtdrucktaster%2C-komplett-EAO-44-747-24-010/p/13511868?q=*&filter_Category3=Befehls-+und+Meldeger%C3%A4te+22+mm&filter_Buyable=1&page=1&origPageSize=10&simi=99.8

That means Google has millions of dublicated URLs in the index and this is really bad for our ranking.

We need on every item detail page a rel=“canonical“ tag to refer to the unique site.

Example from the old web shop:
(…)
<title>BS2E-IC Parallax Mikrocontroller-Modul 8 Bit DIL-24 - Distrelec Schuricht Elektronik & Automation</title><meta NAME="description" content="Parallax BS2E: Heute bestellt, morgen geliefert! Distrelec Schuricht Elektronik & Automation - Basic Stamp Microcontroller Parallax Mikrocontroller-Modul 8 Bit DIL-24 BS2E-IC"><meta NAME="keywords" content="BS2E"><link href="/mikrocontroller-modul-8-bit-dil-24/parallax/bs2e-ic/666058" rel="canonical">
<!-[163578]->

(…)

comments.comment: the "link" tag with rel="canonical" attribute is to use only for product page? Or we need to use it also for other pages such as category page or manufacturer page?
fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3771] Import/export of shopping lists
item.description:
The import tool template file should have the same header fields as the export file from the shopping list.
The customer should be able to export and import the same file without editing.

At the moment the shopping list export file has the following header:

  • Art-Nr
  • Manufacturer
  • Type
  • Quantity
  • Name
  • Availability
  • Stock
  • Packing Size
  • unit 1
  • price 1
  • unit 2
  • price 2
  • unit 3
  • price 3
  • Expired On
  • Replacement Reason

and the import file has the following header:

  • Distrelec Article Number
  • Manufacturer
  • Manufacturer Article Number
  • Quantity

the first 4 fields of the headers should be the same.
The shopping list export should have the following data and it still should be possible to import it through the import tool. We should only consider the first 4 fields there.

  • Distrelec Article Number
  • Manufacturer
  • Manufacturer Article Number
  • Quantity
  • Name
  • Availability
  • Stock
  • Packing Size
  • unit 1
  • price 1
  • unit 2
  • price 2
  • unit 3
  • price 3
  • Expired On

Please remove the replacement reason!

comments.comment:
• Column names changed
  • Replacement Reason removed!
fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3727] Handling of Additinal Address field
item.description:
Where should we store which information.
We have to clarify where in which attribute we have to store which address information. At the moment it is not clear for all cases.

comments.comment:
Attached the new overview:
Red: Remove Field
Yellow: Add Field

Please note: If the customer has filled in a mobile number instead of a normal phone number please replace it.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3725] Hero Teaser: Click on teaser doesn't open link
item.description:
http://test.distrelec.ch/
http://test.distrelec.at/

Hero teaser: click on a teaser doesn't open the referenced link. Applies to all teaser types (image, product), see on test home pages linked above.
item.summary: Hero Teaser: Click on teaser doesn't open link

comments.comment: Raphael reverted the last FE change on this component so that a live deployment is possible.

Link opens, thanks to Raphael's revert.

But this means, that if you click on a hero teaser item image, the hero teaser may still autorotate while the new page is loading. We can not stop autoplay onClick, because this disables the link (hence this ticket). I propose so stop autoplay of the hero teaser on hover.
Do you want autoplay to stop on hover? If not, this ticket can be resolved/closed.
Stop rotate on hover seems reasonable (with resume hover on mouseOut)
Resolved.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3656] Meta Tagging
item.description:
Here we have some very important SEO modifications.
There are a lot of gaps in the new web shop within the meta tags.

The green marked parts in the excel sheet are ok, the red marked parts are missing or should be modified.

Here are the german contents for CHde/AT.

comments.comment:
Analyzed by Pascal:
Main Title, Meta Description, Meta Keywords and Open graph need BE adaptations.
Image Alt text needs little FE and BE adaptation.

Dev effort: ca 1 d
fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3643] Seminar Registration Form - Date to be inserted in the form
item.description:
We would need the following in order of importance:

  • Addition of a field to the form: "Seminar Date"
  • Seminar topic and seminar date should be automatically filled in the registration form (possibly via URL parameter, which would need to be manually maintained on the "register" button on each seminar page in the CMS cockpit)
  • Confirmation mail to Katherine Hetzel for registrations instead of downloading them
  • Confirmation mail to registrant upon registration

Many thanks and best regards
item.summary: Seminar Registration Form - Date to be inserted in the form

comments.comment:
Could you please attach the image.
Thank you.

Hi,

The seminar page is created directly from the cmscockpit. Therefore, the topic and the date are hard-coded. Since there is no data model behind representing the seminar so it is not possible to retrieve these two values.

You need to find a solution.

From: Nabil Benothman | Distrelec (JIRA) AutoMailer@namics.com
Sent: Dienstag, 8. April 2014 16:05
To: Ilie, Oana
Subject: [jira.namics] (DISTRELEC-3643) Seminar Registration Form - Date to be inserted in the form

https://jira.namics.com/s/en_UShvrjco-418945332/854/85/_/jira-logo-scaled.png

https://jira.namics.com/secure/useravatar?avatarId=10462Nabil Benothman | Distrelec<https://jira.namics.com/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=nbenothman> commented on [Change Request] DISTRELEC-3643<https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-3643>
Seminar Registration Form - Date to be inserted in the form<https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-3643>

Hi,

The seminar page is created directly from the cmscockpit. Therefore, the topic and the date are hard-coded. Since there is no data model behind representing the seminar so it is not possible to retrieve these two values.

This message is automatically generated by JIRA.
If you think it was sent incorrectly, please contact your JIRA administrators
For more information on JIRA, see: http://www.atlassian.com/software/jira

Nabil,
As discussed please do it in two versions:
R1: add the parameters to the button on the specific seminar page
R2-Backlog: define a seminar specific object.

As discussed with Raphael Husi and Florian, we decided the following:

  • The first (quick) solution is to have the topic and the date as request parameters (e.g., http://www.distrelec.ch/info-center/seminar/register?topic=Automation%20mit%20LOGO!%20Grundkurs&date=08.05.2014)
  • The second solution (May be implemented later) is to have an object representing the seminar in the database. This requires of course more efforts.

Notes:
for the first solution, the person who is responsible for the seminars creation should also edit the registration link on the seminar page to add the two parameters.
I created the seminar object model for later usage to allow seminar creation directly via HMC (or from the webshop => to be defined).
to test after next deployment

Hi there,

What about the status regarding the two last points:

  • Confirmation mail to Katherine Hetzel (marcom@distrelec.com): As far as I understand Andrea Leiser recieved those (andrea.leiser@distrelec.com), thanks for modifying that
  • Confirmation mail to registrant upon registration

?

Thanks in advance for a short feedback

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3364] Additional address not displayed in confirmation e-mail
item.description:
OS: Windows 7 Enterprise
Browser: IE 8.0.7601.17514
URL: https://test.distrelec.ch/checkout/address

In checkout process, point 1 "Billing- and Shipping Address", the additional addressfield contains a value. This value is missing in the received confirmation e-mail after checkout process. (img_446-448_pzu)

__________
Addition 19.3.14

Payment and delivery address used are displayed in the order conformation email and the attached PDF.

Both of those addresses are missing some (optional) fields in the email and the PDF.

The currently displayed pattern is:
FirstName LastName
Streetname Streetnumber
ZIP Town
EmailAddress

The pattern should be:

B2C Billing AND B2C Shipping
FirstName LastName
AdditionalAddressField
Streetname Streetnumber
PoBox
ZIP Town
Country
EmailAddress

B2B Billing
CompanyName1
CompanyName2
CompanyName3
Streetname Streetnumber
PoBox
ZIP Town
Country
EmailAddress

B2B Shipping
CompanyName1
CompanyName2
CompanyName3
FirstName LastName
Streetname Streetnumber
PoBox
ZIP Town
Country
EmailAddress
item.summary: Additional address not displayed in confirmation e-mail

comments.comment: Laurent, what is the status of this, please?

Hi,

I'm working on it now.

Hi,

The problem is that we never save and read this information.

In MovexCheckoutService : createMovexAddress()
We should write the informtion in the movex address : movexAdd.setCustomerAdd4(address.getAdditionalAddressCompany());

In DistMovexOrderConverter : createAddress()
We should read the information from the movex address and write to the and write it in the address data : address.setAdditionalAddress(movexAddress.getCustomerAdd4());

The open question is : is CustomerAdd4 usable to save this informaiton?
As discussed with Florian, we will make it after the rollout because we need to check if CustomerAdd4 is usable for this information.

Regards,

Laurent

Hi Raphael,

Can you confirm that we can save the Additional address information to the CustomerAdd4 field?

Thank you,

Laurent
Can you prove with the Movex team if we can use this attribute?

The logic is as following:
For B2B:

  • add1 contains "Company Name"
  • add2 contains "Company Name 2"
  • add3 contains "Department"
  • add4 contains "Additional Address / Company Name"
  • add5 contains "Last Name First Name"

For B2C:

  • add1 contains "Last Name First Name"
  • add2 empty
  • add3 empty
  • add4 contains "Additional Address"
  • add5 empty
Seems to be unchanged on Q

Tested in v1.1.11:

  • Ok in the confirmation email
  • Still unchanged in the attached PDF

=> Re-opening this ticket. Not a blocker for P deployment of v1.1.11

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2194] 8.2 Events --> Refactoring needed (functional testing failing so far)
item.description:
Compare e.g.: test.distrelec.ch or http://test.distrelec.ch/de/LED-Stromversorger-60-W-Mean-Well-PLC-60-12/p/11025504

Given: 'activatedEvents' : ['add_products', 'add-cdo', 'acc-att', 'req-hbr', 'add-nsl', 'add-ltc', 'blk-afl', 'blk-acl', 'blk-asl', 'add-ltc', 'blk-rsl', 'cart', 'download', 'list', 'cart', 'compare', 'favorite', 'list', 'print', 'share', 'sup', 'fdb', 'nlt'],

--> So far no tracking-requests are transmitted (except for 'add_products') by click on the specified events (compare Spec p. 17)

  • OS: W7
  • UA: FF 25.0
item.summary: 8.2 Events --> Refactoring needed (functional testing failing so far)

comments.comment: Sieht mir eher nach FE issue aus.

Hi Dominic

  • Event 'cart' --> on product detail sites missing as second request (e.g. compare http://test.distrelec.ch/en/Windows-7-Home-Premium-ita-Vollversion-1-Microsoft-GFC-00142/p/11062288)
  • toolsitem.skin.shopping-bulk ('list'): So far not working
  • shoppinglist-add-to-cart ('add-ltc'): So far not working

Thx Mark
Info: only marks comment is still open. the issues described in the ticket are resolved.

1) Event Cart: This event is already implemented and only needs to be activated. But it is only implemented on the Toolsitem Cart Button (the icon one with the 8 corners) and not on normal Buttons. This means on the Product Detail View, a Click on "Zum Warenkorb hinzufügen..." does not trigger an 8.2 Event.

2) There was a bug which is now resolved.

3) Should already trigger an Event, see the attached Screenshot showing the two requests.
See comment, just call me if you think its easier to discuss over the phone.

4) Regarding 'Event Cart' (-> referring to 'toolsitem.skin.cart'):

--> In terms of Toolsitem Cart Button (the icon one with the 8 corners) the additional event is e.g. not triggered so far for 'Meta HD Flyout Search'

5) Generally please implement the additional event also for normal Buttons (Suche Global, Product Detail View, Meta HD Flyout Search, Compare View, BOM Manager, Shopping Lists)

6) Event 'Shopping Lists /shopping' (-> referring to 'shoppinglist-meta-actions'): So far not working

Thx Mark
4) Added 8.2 Event Tracking to Meta HD Suggest. Resolved.
6) Cannot reproduce. Was the event that maybe not activated? If the issue is still there, please describe it in more detail.

5)

Implemented:

√ Product Detail View (Buying Section)
√ Meta HD Flyout Search (Same as in 4)
√ Compare View
√ BOM Manager (Add to Cart und Add to List Buttons)

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Not Implemented:

  • Suche Global

Please define Tracking ID and which Button exactly should be tracked.

//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Was already implemented:

  • Shopping Lists

Please define Tracking ID and which Button exactly should be tracked.

5) Okay (as discussed on phone: 'Suche Global' = 'Meta HD Flyout Search')

6) Event 'Shopping Lists /shopping': Event is activated and executed. However, the request is so far not poperly (aborted) transmitted. I have shortly looked into this: It seems that a pagereload is generated onclick. Question: Is 'sendunload' accordingly considered for the event?

Thx Mark
6) Okay. Which Event do you mean? "Add a new Shopping List" or "Add all Items to Cart" or another one?

6) The event 'Add a new Shopping List' is meant.

Mark

6) The problem here is the same as in another ticket: The event is fired, but not completely because of the following page load. The specification said, that sendOnUnload would make this possible, bis it does not work. As far as I know, we do not habe the possibility to track this event.

Hi Mark

Please see my latest comment. Unfortunately, I think this can not be tracked. But you could check back with your Webtrekk Contact and ask him, if he knows a solution to track something by Javascript with an immediate page load.

Please compare E-Mail dated Montag, 3. Februar 2014 09:09

Ciao Dominic

Danke für dein Feedback bezüglich DISTRELEC-2648 bzw. -2194.

Wie von dir erwähnt werde ich das gerne umgehend mit unserer Ansprechperson bei Webtrekk anschauen. Ich habe mir dazu den Quellcode (base-Js) angeschaut. Könntest du mir bitte kurz angeben, auf welche Js-Funktion sich z.B. die Klasse 'btn btn-primary' (bezieht sich auf den Fall 'req-snd') bezieht?

Ciao Mark

The best way to see this issue is in the form-feedback module. Suche dazu im File "http://www.distrelec.at/_ui/all/cache/base.js" einfach mal nach "Tc.Module.FormFeedback". Dort passiert nach einem Klick auf den Absenden Button folgendes:

1) sendForm() wird aufgerufen
2) sentFormSuccessful() wird aufgerufen
3) trackEventFormSent wird aufgerufen
3) webtrekkEvent wird gefeuert, was "onWebtrekkEvent" aufruft im Modul "Tc.Module.Webtrekk"
4) wt.sendinfo(webtrekkObj) wird aufgerufen

Diese Details musst du aus meiner Sicht aber gar nicht so genau verstehen. Wichtig wäre nur zu wissen, ob man einen Tracking Event auslösen kann, wenn danach ein PageLoad folgt. Aus meiner Sicht geht das eben nicht.

Move Implementation to on site link.

Rename onWebtrekkOnSiteLink to onWebtrekkEventWithPageLoad in webtrekk.js. Only used in newsletter subscribe so far.

Even if I put the following code directly into the HTML of the Newsletter Subscribe Button, the Request does not seem to be transmitted. You can try and add this via Firebug into the Markup on test.distrelec.at and see it for yourself.

onclick="wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'ch.ons.test.-',sendOnUnload:1}

);"

Hi Dominic

As far as I know Webtrekk Js-functionalities need to be fully and properly initialised during page-loading. That is why a Markup-test within is not working in this regard via Firebug 'from scratch'.

A analogous working example (onclick-event Webtrekk function-call) you can find as following: https://www.distrelec.ch/home (click on promobox - compare attached screenshot).

For an according Hybris-testing please setup a 'onclick="wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'ch.ons.test.-',sendOnUnload:1}

);"'-example on a test-environment (test-page) in order to test the Webtrekk-behaviour on the basis of a givne page-load.

Thx Mark

Hi Mark
Okay good to know, but I already tested this and I tested it now again putting the following link tag in the JSP:

<a href="https://distrelec-ch.local:9002/my-account" onclick="wt.sendinfo(

{linkId:'ch.ons.test.-',sendOnUnload:1}

);">Test</a>

I also tried the one from the current Distrelec Homepage Promo Teaser. There must be another issue. Is maybe a certain plugin not activated or included in the webtrekk v3 Javascript file?

Hi Dominic

I have created an according test-link on Q-environment (http://test.distrelec.ch/de//cms/Technische%20Informationen). Seems to work (compare attached screenshot)

Bests, Mark

Only visible in a traffic sniffer like fiddler.

Todo with Mark: Define affected Module and theri Link ID, see https://wiki.namics.com/display/distrelint/Webtrekk+-+Frontend+Implementation "Events with Page Loads (ehemals Onsite Links)"

See Table "Events with Page Loads (ehemals Onsite Links)", I added every Module thats needs this.

+ Add ID, check that it is a "WithPageLoad" Event
+ Check via Fiddler Sniffer if Values are transmitted
All "Events Link Tags mit name Attribut on Page Load" Impelmented and Tested with Traffic Sniffer.

Hi Dominic

The fix-version v0.5. is noted. Howevere this must have been deployed later on. Is that checked-in respectively foreseen for deployment (FYI: not contained in the 1.1.6 Q-deployment according to release notes)?

Thx Mark

Hi Mark

This is already deployed on http://test.distrelec.at

Hi Dominic

Testing done on test.distrelec.at respectively last item on test.distrelec.ch:

  • sup: WT-request not transmitted in Chrome (thinkable reason: name-attribute before href-tag -> compare attached screenshot) / please submit 'sup-sup' in this case (as specified in the WT-Spec)
  • fdb: WT-request not transmitted in Chrome (thinkable reason: name-attribute before href-tag -> compare attached screenshot) / please submit 'fdb-fdb' in this case (as specified in the WT-Spec)
  • fdb-snd: Could not test that successfully. Please verify.
  • srh-snd: Could not test that successfully. Please verify.
  • spa-spa | spa-snd: Could not test successfully. Please verify (tested via http://test.distrelec.at/de/DET4TC2-%2B-KIT%2C-spieslose-Erdungspr%C3%BCfung-Megger---1000-404/p/serviceplus/90040788)
  • req-hbr | req-snd: Tested 'req-hbr' successfully. Could not test 'req-snd' successfully - please verify (http://test.distrelec.ch/de/Laborkabel-%C3%B8-4-mm-rot-100-cm-Multi-Contact-SML-100cm-red/p/14022002)

Mark

Hi Mark

I only tested the first one "sup" with my traffic sniffer and could see the request after clicking on the Button "Support". I attached a Screenshot.

Don't you see it in your Traffic Sniffer?

Regarding 'sup':

  • Seems to work with IE and FF
  • With Chrome the request seems not to be transmitted. On similar implementations (e.g. Footer-Links) it is yet working. Thereby the name-attribute is however after the href-tag. In order to get 'sup' also in Chrome to work I assume that the name-attribute needs to be placed after the href-tag.

Mark

It also already works in Chrome, but I changed the attribute order anyway.

I tested all those event IDs with my Traffic Sniffer and in my opinion they are all working.

Hi Dominic

E.g. 'fdb-snd' (to be transmitted on successful transmission of the feedback-form) I have also tested privately (no corporate traffic restrictions) on test.distrelec.at. The according request containing the ID seems not to be transmitted. Could you please attach a screenshot of the according Traffic-Sniffer request showing the request respectively the stated ID?

The support-'process' seems to be '2-step' by now. Is 'sup-snd' also implemented?

Thx Mark

1. Der Event heisst fdk-snd und nicht fdb-snd. Soll ich ihn umbenennen in fdb-snd? The event is sent locally on my machine but not on test.distrelec.ch. I am investigating the issue...

2. Support Process is implemented as one step. I will add the second step. Which ID should be used?

Hi Dominic

1. Sorry my mistake (mistyping) -> fdk-snd is correct

2. ID. sup-snd

Thx Mark

Hi Mark

1) Ok

2) Ok, I added this event.

I investigated why you could not see every event on test.distrelec.at. You have to add these events to the list of activated events via HMC. I added fdk-snd and sup-snd to test.distrelec.at and now you should be able to see those too. I attached you a Screenshot.

Ticket resolved.

Hi Dominic

I have tested the implementation on test.distrelec.at. Some findings:

  • Support 1st step: Current: sup -> Required: sup-sup
  • Support 2nd step (http://test.distrelec.at/de/Support/cms/support): Request containing 'sup-snd' is not transmitted on successful form-transmission.
  • Feedback 1st step: Current: fdb -> Required: fdb-fdb
  • Feedback 2nd step (http://test.distrelec.at/de/Feedback/cms/feedback): Request containing 'fdb-snd' is not transmitted on successful form-transmission. Request is however transmitted if captcha is entered wrongly. To be refactored.

-> Pleae verify for all according events on test.distrelec.at and refactor accordingly.

Thx Mark

Hi Mark

Which if the issues in this ticket are still open? All in your latest comment?

Thanks!

Hi Dominic

In my view there is preliminary 'issue' (pre-condition to enable thorough testing/verification) which needs to be initially tackled in this regard: In case that new events are defined and implemented (as the once in this ticket) their id's shall automatically be added to the list of activated events by default (given also in case of redeployments). Could that be implemented given a reasonable effort?

Thx Mark

Discussed with Mark on the phnone:

check sup / sup-sup and fdb / fdb-fdb and then close this ticket. for any other issues, mark will open a new ticket.

Changed ID's as described and verified that all four are transmitted:

sup-sup and sup-snd
fdb-fdb and fdb-snd

Can be tested on test.distrelec.ch after the next deployment.

Hi Dominic

As agreed I am going to test the above indicated four events as soons as they are deployed. For the remaining events I am going to open a new ticket and assign to you.
